Title: Bushwhacked
Plot: On a salvage mission aboard a drifting colony ship, the Serenity crew find signs that the crew were killed by the cannibalistic Reavers. They find one survivor, but things take a turn for the worse when an Alliance ship looking for an unspecified Firefly-class ship with brother-and-sister stowaways shows up and takes them in.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
GuestStars: Branden Morgan, Doug Savant, Lancer Dean Shull, Doug Wax, Jared Poe
